Description:
Detects execution of netsh with the "advfirewall" and the "set" option in order to set new values for properties of a existing rule

Author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Firewall Rule Update Via Netsh.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\netsh.exe' and original_file_name = 'netsh.exe') and (command like '% firewall %' and command like '% set %'))
